url.label: Enter the specific web address that you are reporting
url.hint: The web address can be found at the top of the browser window and starts with "www.", "http://" or "https://".

location.label: Where can we find the material on the page? (optional)
location.short: Where can we find the material on the page?
location.hint: For example, if it's an image, video or text, where is it on the page? If it's in a social media feed, what time and date was it posted?

description.label: Tell us more about the material you are submitting (optional)
description.hint: How did you find the material? Do you know any details that would help us investigate, such as the names or locations of the people involved?

anonymous.legend: Can we contact you for more information?

no.label: Yes, I'll add my contact details
